name: Sui
description: A next-generation smart contract platform with high throughput, low latency, and an asset-oriented programming model powered by the Move programming language (in devnet).

name: 0L
description: A reference implementation of a neutral replicated state machine. Forked from the Libra/Diem technologies (in mainnet).

name: Starcoin
description: A smart contract blockchain network that scales by layering (in mainnet).

name: Aptos
description: Aptos-core strives towards being the safest and most scalable layer one blockchain solution (in testnet).

name: Pontem
description: Substrate based parachain with MoveVM onboard (in testnet).

name: Celo
description: Blockchain with EVM and MoveVM (coming soon).

name: Diem
description: The original Move based blockchain from Meta (form. Libra by Facebook) (discontinued).

name: ChainX
description: Bitcoin's layer2 smart contract network has already supported WASM and EVM, and is supporting MoveVM (in mainnet).

name: Move Book
description: Move book maintained by the Move core team (中文).

name: Move Book
description: Move book maintained by @damirka (中文).

name: Move Patterns
description: A book on Move software design patterns maintained by @villesundell.

name: Implementing, testing, and verifying a fungible token
description: Maintained by the Move core team.

name: Programming with objects
description: Maintained by the Sui team.

name: Move and SmartContract Development
description: Maintained by the Starcoin team.

name: Move Language
description: Interactive Move language course, free for everyone, maintained by imcoding.online (中文).

name: Move @ Sui by Mysten Labs Discord
MoveChina
description: The largest Chinese community for the Move programming language.

name: Fungible token examples
description: Multiple example token implementations from Sui.

name: BasicCoin
description: A toy implementation of an ERC20-like fungible token.

name: Diem
description: An ERC20-like token with permissioned minting/burning, see also this spec. Deployed on 0L.

name: Token
description: Another ERC20-like Token. Deployed on Starcoin.

name: GAS
description: A token that instantiates the Diem standard above. Deployed on 0L.

name: STC
description: A token that instantiates the Starcoin standard above. Deployed on Starcoin.

name: STAR
description: A governance token of Starswap dApp that powers the AMM+DEX ecosystem. Deployed on Starcoin.

name: XUSDT
description: A mapped assets of USDT on Starcoin.

name: XETH
description: A mapped assets of ETH on Starcoin.

name: WEN stablecoin
description: Deployed on Starcoin.

name: FAI stablecoin
description: An over-collateralized stable coin deployed on Starcoin.

name: FLY stablecoin
description: An implementation of forked OHM that deployed on Starcoin.

name: Synthetic token backed by a basket containing a reserve of other tokens
description: From Diem.

name: XBTC
description: BTC mirror asset on Aptos.

name: XBTC
description: BTC mirror asset on Sui.

name: NFT examples
description: Multiple NFT example implementations from Sui.

name: NFT
description: An ERC721-like token. Deployed on Starcoin.

name: Merkle Airdrop
description: Utility for airdropping a large number of NFTs. Deployed on Starcoin.

name: NFT
description: An implementation of a hybrid ERC721/ERC1155-like token. From Diem.

name: BARS
description: An NFT that instantiates this hybrid standard. From Diem.

name: MultiToken
description: An ERC1155-like token. From Diem.

name: NFTGallery
description: Utility for holding multiple NFT's of the same type. From Diem.

name: NFT Protocol
description: NFT protocol and collection framework. From OriginByte.

name: Suia
description: The first POAP application on Sui.

name: aptos-cid
description: Decentralized identity on Aptos, the underlying account system of ComingChat.

name: DeFi examples
description: Multiple DeFi example implementations from Sui.

name: CoinSwap
description: A toy implementation of a Uniswap-like liquidity pool containing two tokens.

name: Starswap
description: A Uniswap-style DEX. Deployed on Starcoin.

name: Offer
description: Generic implementation of atomic swaps for any pair of assets.

name: AptosRedPacket
description: A red packet social app that combines private chat and encrypted wallet on Aptos.

name: SuiRedPacket
description: A red packet social app that combines private chat and encrypted wallet on Sui.

name: AptosAMMswap
description: Aptos AMM Swap implemented by the OmniBTC team.

name: SuiAMMswap
description: Sui AMM Swap implemented by the OmniBTC team.

name: AptosOmniSwap
description: One-click swap between aptos and EVM chains (such as ETH/BSC/AVAX, etc.) based on the cross-chain interoperability protocol wormhole.

name: DolaProtocol
description: A Decentralized Omnichain Liquidity Aggregation Protocol with the single coin pool of each public chain as the core, Wormhole, Layerzero and other cross-chain messaging protocols as the bridge, and Sui public chain as the settlement center.

name: Dmens
description: Decentralized Moments which is a Blockchain Twitter Protocol built on the Sui network.

name: ValidatorUniverse
description: Validator set management. Deployed on 0L.

name: Oracle
description: For on-chain community voting. Deployed on 0L.

name: DAO
description: For on-chain proposals and voting. Deployed on Starcoin.

name: DiemSystem
description: Validator set management. From Diem.

name: Vote
description: On-chain voting. From Diem.

name: Poly Bridge
description: The first Cross-Chain Bridge between Move and EVM. Deployed on Starcoin.

name: OmniBTC Bridge
description: A bridge between Bitcoin and Move language public chains (like Aptos and Sui) based on ultra-light node.

name: Account
description: A generic account for Diem-powered chains. From Diem.

name: DiemAccount
description: Fork of the above. From 0L.

name: Account
description: Fork of the above. From Starcoin.

name: Move standard library
description: Utilities intended (but not required) to be used in every platform running Move. From the Move repo.

name: Move nursery
description: Experimental modules that may eventually be promoted into the standard library. From the Move repo.

name: Decimal
description: Efficient implementation of a decimal value. From 0L.

name: Math
description: Math utility functions. From Starcoin.

name: Compare
description: Polymorphic comparison (i.e., compare any two Move values of the same type). From the nursery.

name: Vault
description: Library for capabilities. From the nursery.

name: ACL
description: Library for list-based access control. From the nursery.

name: TaoHe
description: A collection of nestable Move resources.

name: Starcoin Framework Commons
description: Libraries for Move commons utility on starcoin-framework. From Starcoin.

name: Movemate
description: Smart contract building blocks for Aptos and Sui (Math utilities, governance contracts, escrow, and more). Maintained by the Pentagon team.

name: Move cron parser
description: Library is built for a purpose of parsing cron expression. Maintained by Snowflake Network team.

name: Move-on-EVM
description: Experimental project to compile Move source code to EVM bytecode.

name: Move Package Manager
description: Like cargo or npm for Move: single CLI (and corresponding Rust API's for other tools to hook into) for building, running, testing, debugging, and verifying Move packages. Maintained by the Move core team.

name: Move Prover
description: Formal verification of user-defined specifications written in Move source code. Maintained by the Move core team.

name: Move Read/Write Set Analyzer
description: Static analysis tool for computing an overapproximation of the global memory touched by a Move program. Maintained by the Move core team.

name: Move Playground JS Library
description: Wrapping Move Playground by Pontem as a JavaScript library for browser. You can use it to build your own Move Playground.

name: Move VS Code plugin
description: Maintained by the Move core team (source code).

name: Move IntelliJ plugin
description: Maintained by the Pontem team (source code).

name: Move Playground
description: Like Remix for Move. Alpha version of a Web IDE. See instructions. Maintained by the Pontem team.

name: Starcoin IDE
description: Maintained by the Starcoin team (source code).

name: Move Vim
description: Maintained by @rvmelkonian.

name: move-mode
description: Major mode for Emacs maintained by @amnn.

name: Movey
description: A crates.io-style repository of Move packages.

name: StarMask
description: A wallet for the Starcoin blockchain. Maintained by the Starcoin team (Chrome Webstore).

name: Sui Wallet
description: A chrome (v88+) extension wallet for Sui (Chrome Webstore).

name: Pontem Wallet
description: Wallet extension for Aptos network by the Pontem team (Chrome Webstore).

name: Fewcha Aptos Wallet
description: The wallet of layer 1 blockchain Aptos (Chrome Webstore).

name: bcs-js
description: JavaScript implementation of the BCS serialization scheme used by Move, may be useful for implementing wallets.

name: ComingChat
description: A decentralized social finance/web3 portal.  Supporting public chain wallets, such as Sui and Aptos wallets.

name: Suiet Wallet
description: A open-source wallet for Sui. (Chrome Webstore, Website)

name: Sui Wallet
description: Sui Wallet Adapter.

name: Suiet Wallet
description: Suiet Wallet Adapter.

name: Suiet Wallet Kit
description: A package support all Sui wallets with customizable UI.

name: go-sui-sdk
description: Sui Golang SDK.

name: go-aptos-sdk
description: Aptos Golang SDK.

name: OmniSwap-Sui-SDK
description: AMM Swap SDK on Sui Network.

name: Move: A Language With Programmable Resources
description: This was the original Move white paper released in 2018. Many aspects of this are now out of date (e.g., the syntax and description of the bytecode instructions), but the first two sections are worth a read for explaining the difficulties of programming with assets and how Move tackles them.

Verification of Programs Written in Libra's Move Language
Move: A Safe Language for Programming with Money
description: Talk from @sblackshear at the Fields Institute Blockchain research seminar series.

name: Formal Verification of Move Programs for the Libra Blockchain
description: Talk from @DavidLDill at the Fields Institute Blockchain research seminar series.
